drug_crocin_advance.name: Crocin Advance
drug_crocin_advance.warnings: Fast-absorbing paracetamol; do not exceed 4000mg/day to avoid liver damage.

drug_paracetamol_650.name: Paracetamol (Dolo Crocin 650)
drug_paracetamol_650.warnings: Standard for high fever; leave at least 4-6 hours between doses.

drug_combiflam.name: Combiflam
drug_combiflam.warnings: Take with food to prevent stomach upset; avoid in patients with asthma or ulcers.

drug_cetirizine.name: Cetirizine (Okacet)
drug_cetirizine.warnings: Commonly used for allergies; may cause mild drowsiness in some individuals.

drug_gelusil.name: Gelusil
drug_gelusil.warnings: Antacid for acidity and heartburn; take after meals or at bedtime.
